mapper.select: SELECT rn, bid, book_Name, author, publication_Date,location FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(order by create_Date desc) as rn,bid, book_Name, author, publication_Date,location FROM book ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
SELECT bid, book_Name, author, story, publication_Date,location, TO_CHAR(create_Date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS create_Date, creator_Id FROM book WHERE bid=#{bid} AND deleted_YN='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book ( bid, book_Name, author, story, publication_Date,location,create_Date, creator_Id ) VALUES ( book_seq.nextval, #{book_Name}, #{author}, #{story}, #{publication_Date}, #{location}, sysdate, #{creator_Id} )
mapper.select: SELECT bid, book_Name, author, story, publication_Date,location, TO_CHAR(create_Date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS create_Date, creator_Id FROM book WHERE bid=#{bid} AND deleted_YN='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET book_Name=#{book_Name}, author=#{author}, story=#{story}, publication_Date=#{publication_Date}, location=#{location} WHERE bid = #{bid}
